abstract.text: Make large-scale mathematical computations and image calculations, optimized for high performance and low energy consumption.
Computes the Euclidean norm and writes the result to the output tensor.
Backpropogates gradients for the compute norm function.
Computes the specified norm over an entire tensor or the specified axes.

A raw pointer for accessing untyped data.
A pointer for accessing and manipulating data of a specific type.
